humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions have a glyph from "文" from " house " to " bow ", or interpreted as the word "彦", let me talk about it. (See "Zi"), "Wen said," that " Yan " from " Wen ", " factory " sound.

" Yan " means a person with talent and virtue. "Er Ya. Shixun: "A beautiful scholar is Yan." "Said Wen": "Yan, beautiful scholars have literature, and what people say." Examples are "Shang Shu. Taijia First": "Xian Wang Shuang Pixian, sit and wait, and ask for Jun Yan." "Poetry. Zheng Feng. "Gao Qiu": "Beiqi's son, the country's Yan Xi!" Mao Chuan: "Yan, the good name of a scholar."

" Yan " also expresses talent. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "The Two Kings of Xu and Hu": "It can be described as a good minister of the country, and a good man of time." Liu Yuxi of the Tang Dynasty "Wei Shengbing Yaoshu": "I have been a scholar of Shudian for four years, and his residence and residence are both Hongsheng and Yanshi."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions have a glyph from "文" from " house " to " bow ", or interpreted as the word "彦", I said. " Yan " means a person with talent and virtue, but also a person with talent.
humanum_full_description:
金文有從「文」從「厂」從「弓」的字形，或釋為「彥」字，姑備一說。（參《字源》）《說文》以為「彥」從「彣」，「厂」聲。

　　「彥」表示有才德之士。《爾雅．釋訓》：「美士為彥。」《說文》：「彥，美士有文，人所言也。」例子如《尚書．太甲上》：「先王昧爽丕顯，坐以待旦，旁求俊彥。」《詩．鄭風．羔裘》：「彼其之子，邦之彥兮！」毛傳：「彥，士之美稱。」

　　「彥」也表示有才德。如《三國志．魏書．徐胡二王傳》：「可謂國之良臣，時之彥士矣。」唐代劉禹錫〈魏生兵要述〉：「余為書殿學士四年，所與居皆鴻生彥士。」
humanum_short_description: 金文有從「文」從「厂」從「弓」的字形，或釋為「彥」字，姑備一說。「彥」表示有才德之士，也表示有才德。

金文有從「 文 」從「 厂 」從「 弓 」的字形，或釋為「 彥 」字，姑備一說。（參《字源》）《說文》以為「 彥 」從「 彣 」，「 厂 」聲。 「 彥 」表示有才德之士。《爾雅．釋訓》：「美士為彥。」《說文》：「彥，美士有文，人所言也。」例子如《尚書．太甲上》：「先王昧爽丕顯，坐以待旦，旁求俊彥。」《詩．鄭風．羔裘》：「彼其之子，邦之彥兮！」毛傳：「彥，士之美稱。」 「 彥 」也表示有才德。如《三國志．魏書．徐胡二王傳》：「可謂國之良臣，時之彥士矣。」唐代劉禹錫〈魏生兵要述〉：「余為書殿學士四年，所與居皆鴻生彥士。」

Taijia First": "Xian Wang Shuang Pixian, sit and wait, and ask for Jun Yan." "Poetry. Zheng Feng. "Gao Qiu": "Beiqi's son, the country's Yan Xi!" Mao Chuan: "Yan, the good name of a scholar." " Yan" also expresses talent. Such as "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "The Two Kings of Xu and Hu": "It can be described as a good minister of the country, and a good man of time." Liu Yuxi of the Tang Dynasty "Wei Shengbing Yaoshu": "I have been a scholar of Shudian for four years, and his residence and residence are both Hongsheng and Yanshi."

彥字的基本解释

彥
yàn
同“彦”。

彥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yàn］
［《廣韻》魚變切，去線，疑。］
“彥1”的新字形。
(1)贤士；俊才。
(2)美好。

彥字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彡字部】　彥； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页363第13
【唐韻】魚變切【集韻】魚戰切【韻會】疑戰切【正韻】倪甸切，?音諺。【說文】美士有文，人所言也。【爾雅·釋訓】美士爲彥。【註】人所彥詠。【疏】國有美士，爲人所言道。【書·太甲】旁求俊彥。【詩·鄭風】邦之彥兮。　又叶倪堅切，諺平聲。【陸雲·陸公誄】和音嗣世，不替碩彥。明鑒在下。隆命上?。

彥字的源字形
